channel.title: Making on Özlem Yönder Prints
channel.description: Recent content in Making on Özlem Yönder Prints

item.title: Inking the carved block of 'Bathers by the Ruhr'
item.description: Inking the linoleum block of ‘Bathers by the Ruhr’ for a test print.

item.title: Test print of 'Bathers by the Ruhr'
item.description: This is a test print of ‘Bathers by the Ruhr,’ capturing the memory of a beautiful sunny day by the Ruhr, when tiny fish gently nibbled at our feet.

item.title: Bear hug
item.description: Print of the “bear hug”. I am inspired by all the animals who cuddle their babies while sleeping.

item.title: Printing women who runs with the wolves
item.description: Test prints of “women who runs with the wolves”. I made this print back in 2022 after reading the book by Clarissa Pinkola Estés.

item.title: Logo in the making
item.description: I created a logo for my printing journey, inspired by Linden, who encourages me to learn and grow alongside him.
